articles.title: Taliban take key city close to Kabul as US troops arrive to assist evacuations - CNA
articles.description:
KABUL: The Taliban pushed closer to Kabul on Saturday (Aug 14), capturing a key city near Afghanistan's capital as American troops flew in to help evacuate embassy personnel and other civilians.

Continuing a rapid advance, the insurgents took Pul-e-Alam, a…
articles.content:
United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned that "Afghanistan is spinning out of control" and urged all parties to do more to protect civilians.

articles.author: Kayla Rivas
articles.title: CDC director OKs COVID-19 booster shot for some Americans with weak immune systems - Fox News
articles.description: Dr. Rochelle Walensky, director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), has upheld a vote by a panel of independent experts that moderate-to-severe immunocompromised individuals may receive a Pfizer or Moderna COVID-19 booster shot.
articles.content: Dr. Rochelle Walensky, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), upheld a vote Friday by a panel of independent experts that moderate-to-severe immunocompromised individua… [+2491 chars]

articles.title: Transfer news and rumours LIVE: Real plotting €120m Mbappe swoop - Goal.com
articles.description: Teenage American fullback Joe Scally put in a standout performance in his Bundesliga debut for Borussia Monchengladbach and it came against star-studded Bayern Munich.
